DOC.HEADLINE: List of winners at Grammy Awards ceremony

TEXT.P: Following is a list of winners at Sunday night's Grammy Awards ceremony in Los Angeles:
-- "Single Ladies (Put A Ring On It)," Thaddis Harrell, Beyonce Knowles, Terius Nash & Christopher Stewart, songwriters (Beyonce)
-- "Run This Town," Jay-Z, Rihanna & Kanye West
-- "A Colbert Christmas: The Greatest Gift Of All!," Stephen Colbert.
